entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -37.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 08:02 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

Humidity: 66 %

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 36.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 39 with temperature falling to minus 42 in the afternoon.
